lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch said the application of the legal code of Islam has resulted in widespread rights abuses in the conservative province of Aceh.
snippet: Human Rights Watch said the application of the legal code of Islam has resulted in widespread rights abuses in the conservative province of Aceh.

headline.main: Group Calls on Indonesia to Overturn Shariah Laws
headline.print_headline: Rights Group Calls on Indonesia to Overturn Shariah Laws
